message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think you'll find it very valuable. I'm asking for $115.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $105 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $110.  It's a fantastic product, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the value.
I understand you're willing to come down to $110, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Can you try to meet me at $108?
